metadata.title: CVE-2022-20154 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In lock_sock_nested of sock.c, there is a possible use after free due to arace condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege withSystem execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-174846563References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
